settings.title: Alfa Laval Unique DV-ST UltraPure
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Unique DV-ST UltraPure Diaphragm Valve is specifically designed for aseptic applications. It serves as a reliable solution for shutting off, diverting, and regulating fluid flow in hygienic, high-purity, and aseptic processing lines.

  • Versatile, modular and durable design
  • Compact, reliable and straightforward
  • Hygienic and aseptic design
  • Easy installation, validation and qualification
  • Standard with full Q-doc documentation meeting the
    demands from high-purity applications
  • Meets current Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP)
    regulations

Designed to meet the diverse needs of various industries, this diaphragm valve is ideal for dosing, filling, diverting, and regulating duties in hygienic, high-purity, and aseptic processes. It finds applications in the biotech and pharmaceutical sectors, as well as in aseptic and hygienic processes within the dairy, food, beverage, and brewery industries.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
